body.name: Kinder King 3 in 1 Reversible Baby Stroller w/Detachable Tray, Convert to Newborn Bassinet Pram, Folding Infant Carriage for Toddler, Adjustable Canopy, Aluminum Alloy, Suspension Wheels, Pink
features: Grow with your child: From newborn bassinet to baby stroller to witness the growth. Additional detachable tray withe cup holder is designed for daily meals or play. The reversible seat allows your kids to view outside or face smiling parents.

Give your more choice: Three modes: sleeping, lying and sitting. Three-position canopy; Two-position child tray.The visor can be removed. Six- position canopy and handle; Adjustable elastic backrest. Removable handrail and foot cover. The adjustable front wheels can 360 degrees rotate or keep straight.

Thoughtful design: The whole body of the infant high landscape stroller adopts skin-friendly material. Breathable window screens on three sides. Mesh skylight at the top. Large bottom storage basket. A storage net behind the seat of the baby stroller.

Safety certification: Equipped with spring suspension system to easily adapt to various surfaces. EVA front wheels and rubber rear wheels. Five-point safety harness; Safety wrist strap to prevent it from slipping away. One foot to brake.

Ideal for gifts: Easy to assemble, no tools required. Aluminum alloy, light weight and easy to operate. Easy to fold for family trips or going out. It's a great choice for baby shower, birthday gifts, Christmas and other holidays. Extra you can get: a soft cushion, a mosquito net, a cup holder.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: REVERSIBLE MODE When the seat faces forward, the high landscape stroller allows your kids to enjoy the view outside and stay away from car fumes. In backward mode, mom and baby can interact face to face. You can see your baby smiling at you.

Previous page ADJUSTABLE SEAT Can be reclined to different positions for sleeping, lying and sitting EFFECTIVE AIR CIRCULATION Pulling on foot cover can also turn into a warm space. Four Seasons general. SPRING SUSPENSION SYSTEM Equipped with spring suspension system, easy to adapt to a variety of surfaces. SIMPLE TO FOLD & STORE No tools required to assemble. Easy to fold for family trips or going out. Next page 1 Adjustable Seat 2 Effective Air Circulation 3 Spring Suspension System 4 Simple To Fold & Store

Adjustable Seat Belt The adjustable five-point harness is effective in protecting the baby's safety. Large Storage Space The large storage basket can be used to store your baby's necessities or as a shopping basket. Custom Front Wheels The front wheels can be adjusted to suit your needs. Upward-360 Rotating; Downward-Fixing direction Additional You Can Get Extra you can get: a soft cushion, a mosquito net and a cup holder.

WHY DID YOU CHOOSE US Kinder King baby stroller will be a great companion for your baby's growth. On the basis of sleeping bassinet and standard baby stroller, the child tray mode is designed thoughtfully. This effectively solves baby feeding problems when outside. Equipped with spring suspension system. Simple folding for storage or carrying. Ideal for baby shower, birthday gifts, Christmas and other holidays.

reviews.reviewerName: Ana Yulia Perez CastilloAna Yulia Perez Castillo
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it, but it. Nice and comfortable. Cozy
reviews.reviewText: Esta carreola de bebé es muy linda y está a excelente precio.Si está buscando una carreola pequeña y portable, esta no es una opción. Pero si lo que está buscando es una carreola grande, espaciosa, y sobre todo cómoda para su bebé. Esta carreola le encantará, se ve hermosa y hasta lujosa. Puede quedar de forma horizontal tipo cuna, y también para niños más grandes como en mi caso, lo compré para mi hijo de casi 2 años. Está carreola es perfecta para recién nacidos o para toddlers. Ósea niños de 1a 3 años. Me encantó que el canopy es muy amplio y cubre perfectamente bien. Algo maravilloso es que trae un tubo para que el bebé se sostenga y se puede cambiar a una bandeja comedora. (Food Tray) es genial para sus snacks o su comida. En la parte de abajo tiene un almacenamiento amplio donde puede poner la pañalera o más cosas. Es excelente para andar por el vecindario de compras tiene gran almacenamiento. (Very nice for shopping).Cosas extras: Trae un portavasos, un mosquitero y un cushion pad, para que el bebé esté más comodo.La recomiendo al 100%Es una carreola con un excelente precioEs hermosa, lujosa, y trae accesorios que no muchas carreola traen. Por lo general uno las compra por separado. Y en este caso accesorios como el porta vaso; son geniales que ya vengan incluidos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to put together. Lightweight but very sturdy and will last till toddler stages. Love that it’s so versatile, goes from bassinet to upright stroller. Good quality and a good price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great customer service.
reviews.reviewText: Great product and even better customer service. Thank you Kinder King!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was back and forth about many different strollers and finally decided on this. I love it! Light , easy to assemble, mesh sides that have a cover if you don’t want to use but it great for us for summer. Good storage. Moves smooth. My son loves it too and he hated being in his previous stroller but never complains in this one. It’s perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My daughter hates being strapped into her car seat for walks, so my husband bought us this to use and omg it's a life changer! Our daughter loves it, she can stretch out and just chill! It's very easy to take down and to set up! We use it almost every day!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The instructions were not concise and I tried to YOUTUBE, but nothing available. A soft mat was included with no instructions as to what to do with it. Should the pad have been under the main carriage material?
